name: Steps of Multitaste
description:
A boy named Boy wants to take part in a cooking contest at the Tasty Fair. He has been preparing for it for days. 

You need to help him get to the fair. And to do this, you need to explore the Yummy Village and get acquainted with its inhabitants.

Combat system

The game uses a turn-based combat system. 

Visitors to the cafe in which you cook order food. You, as the chef, have to serve them. Each dish is assigned to a specific shop: Cold Shop, Hot Shop and Confectioner. It is desirable that the level of the shop of the character is higher or coincides with the level of the dish.

The playable characters on the battlefield have the next characteristics:

Pressure - increases when the character is attacked;

Energy - decreases after each cooked dish;

Returns - decreases after each dish served incorrectly. 

Explore the Yummy Village

You can communicate with characters, complete quests, create dishes, collect cookbooks, and take part in cooking battles.

A notepad will help you explore the village. It displays quests, character characteristics, dishes, and ingredients in your inventory.
